an10.220:4.1: Then a certain brahmin went up to the Buddha
an10.220:4.3: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side,
an10.220:4.5: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell?”
an10.220:4.6: “Unprincipled and unjust conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
an10.220:5.1: “But what is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm?”
an10.220:5.2: “Principled and just conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
an10.220:6.1: “I don’t understand the detailed meaning of what Master Gotama has said in brief.
an10.220:6.2: Please, Master Gotama, teach me this matter so I can understand the detailed meaning.”
an10.220:6.3: “Well then, brahmin, listen and pay close attention,
an10.220:7.1: “Brahmin, unprincipled and unjust conduct is threefold by way of body,
an10.220:7.3: and threefold by way of mind.
an10.220:8.1: And how is unprincipled and unjust conduct threefold by way of body? …
an10.220:8.2: That’s how unprincipled and unjust conduct is threefold by way of body.
an10.220:9.1: And how is unprincipled and unjust conduct fourfold by way of speech? …
an10.220:9.2: That’s how unprincipled and unjust conduct is fourfold by way of speech.
an10.220:10.1: And how is unprincipled and unjust conduct threefold by way of mind? …
an10.220:10.2: That’s how unprincipled and unjust conduct is threefold by way of mind.
an10.220:10.3: That’s how unprincipled and unjust conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
an10.220:11.1: Principled and just conduct is threefold by way of body,
an10.220:11.3: and threefold by way of mind.
an10.220:12.1: And how is principled and just conduct threefold by way of body? …
an10.220:12.2: That’s how principled and just conduct is threefold by way of body.
an10.220:13.1: And how is principled and just conduct fourfold by way of speech? …
an10.220:13.2: That’s how principled and just conduct is fourfold by way of speech.
an10.220:14.1: And how is principled and just conduct threefold by way of mind? …
an10.220:14.2: That’s how principled and just conduct is threefold by way of mind.
an10.220:14.3: That’s how principled and just conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
an10.220:15.2: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”
